channel.title: *how to move ONE npc to another? [no autospawn or anything]*
channel.description:
OK just take a look at this picture:
[IMG]http://i661.photobucket.com/albums/uu331/deathlyags/idkhowtofindautospawnccfgpleasesum1.jpg[/img]
i didn't know if autospawn.cfg had the correct thing that shows where to change NPC's X and Y coords. i wanted to move the NPc to a diffrent loaction, does anyone know where i could change that? thanks!
